headline: Linde (LIN) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Narratives Despite Slower Earnings Growth
summary: Linde (LIN) posted net profit margins of 21.2%, up from last year’s 19.3%, alongside annual earnings growth of 11.1%, which is slower than the five-year average growth of 20.5%. Revenue growth is projected at 5.4% per year, with earnings forecast to rise 9.1% annually. Both of these figures are expected to trail the anticipated pace of the broader US market. For investors, the main takeaway is that while margins and profits have improved, the outlook points to more tempered growth in the near...
